modName: Daedric Dragonbone Ebony and Glass Armor collection
summary: These are weapon and armor sets I have reskinned for SkyRim. They contain armor and weapons for Daedric, Dragonbone, Ebony, and Glass Armors. Update: All armors are now STANDALONE! I hope you like them
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=10][b]Blueguile's[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=5][b]Armor and Weapons Collection[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=7][b]Now With Standalone Armor[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=3][b]All standalone armor is creatable at the forge. They can be enchanted and improved. Each armor has a slightly higher rating than the standard armor. Also the items needed to craft the armor has been added to by an ingot of a certain type for each. All armor has male and female versions.[/b][/size][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/oom382O.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][youtube]TYSxUDeZ5RA[/youtube][/center]



[center]I was tired of the default armors and weapons so I decided to make my own. Friends of mine who played SkyRim wanted them as well. They also suggested that I put them up here for download.So here they are...I uploaded the Ebony Armor earlier last year and some people wanted me to make the Ebony mail armor. So now that is included as well.If you like it please endorse it.[/center]

[center][size=10][b]The Armor Sets Included[/b][/size][/center]

[center][size=5]Black & Brushed Chrome Daedric Weapons and Armor[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Halfk85.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]I decided to change the Deadric armor to look more menacing and making it a hi-res skin. I also used Nif Scope and a YouTube tutorial to change the armor glow. I made it bigger and added red glow to the eyes. I have included the meshes in the download as well. The boot texture has been redone so the boot tread is completely across the bottom of the boot.If you like it please endorse it.[/center]

[center][youtube]SWSDOGTfZ2s[/youtube][/center]

[center][size=5]Real Bone Dragonbone Weapons and Armor[/size][/center]
[center][size=5]You must have the DLC Dawnguard for the Dragonbone Weapons[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzNCm2N.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]The Dragonbone armor and weapons looked just a little to dark to be bone to me. So I decided to make it look more like dry sun bleached out bone.I also took the liberty to redo the helmet. I changed the horns to be pourous and different. I also eliminated the eye ports on the face of the helmet. Due to a friend who likes green, there is also a green scale version of the armor and weapons as well.If you like it please endorse it.[/center]

[center][size=5]Black & Gold Ebony Weapons and Armor (includes Ebony Mail)[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/RoAoYum.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]I did not like the Ebony textures on the weapons and armor. I made new textures and applied them to the armor and weapons. There are slight differences in the male and female armors. I did this because hey, its two different types and I didn't want the vanilla armor showing up in game. There is a video to show the armor but it won't embed. Sorry about that. But it is in the video tab. Every ebony weapon is re-skined,textured, normal mapped and M mapped.If you like it please endorse it.[/center]

[center][youtube]UdifcADz4Wg[/youtube][/center]

[center][size=5]Hammered Bronze & Glass Weapons and Armor[/size][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/MRMfsTx.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]I did not like the Glass textures on the weapons and armor as well. So yet again, I made new textures and applied them to the armor and weapons. There are slight differences in the male and female armors in these also. I did this because hey, I did it for the other armors. Every glass weapon is re-skined,textured, normal mapped and M mapped. If you like it please endorse it.[/center]

[center][youtube]9l2vjSuN6O8[/youtube][/center]
author: Blueguile
